none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on March 09, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
Brutally raw Bay Area thrash metal. No hint of melody or temperance, this is visceral and fierce and hellbent for pure speed and complete thrash. Two rehearsal demos from 1985/86, INSANITY were way ahead of their time. This one is not for the weak. INSANITY
//4.bp.blogspot.com/-dK4G2gNPyrI/UxfNk1wd9yI/AAAAAAAAJpM/Pd-kd7jwG_4/s1600/insanity+cover.jpg //2.bp.blogspot.com/-cU6ViaqfDww/UxfPLbeUg4I/AAAAAAAAJpY/vgObQphMCB4/s1600/insanity+img+copy.jpg

seo.title: Insanity - Rehearsal '85/Practice'86 - Terminal Escape
